inclusion.criterion: Children between 12 and 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Admitted to the hospital for an acute vaso-occlusive crisis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to tolerate oral pain medications
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to be compliant with the assigned arm of study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood and is currently experiencing severe bone pain.
